metadata.title: CVE-2019-13103 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - negligible.
metadata.description: A crafted self-referential DOS partition table will cause all Das U-Boot versions through 2019.07-rc4 to infinitely recurse, causing the stack to grow infinitely and eventually either crash or overwrite other data.

criterions.comment: u-boot package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2020.04+dfsg-2ubuntu1').
